::Feline::

The sudden realization of it all hit her like a train.  She had been 
with the famous autobot leader and didn't know it. "You mean 
your...I..ah..we..ah..your..ah.."  She looked at his ensignia and 
fainted dead away.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "I'm just Hot Rod, just another Maximal warrior. But if you go by 
the
> history tapes, I'm Rodimus Prime, sucessor of Optimus Prime, 
destroyer
> of Unicron, savior of Cybertron, ex- Autobot commander, and the 
Matrix's
> chosen one. But I hate all the glory. I really didn't like 
command." He
> pulled a thin metal square, from his chest. The part that showed 
had the
> Maximal symbol, but he showed her the other side, with the Autobot
> symbol.
